resources.string: You are connected through a Wifi.
You are connected through mobile data.
Not a valid account, please retry.
Place your fingertip on the Home button to verify your identity
Analyze taken or imported photo of retina or fundus image that will be diagnosed based on the stages of diabetic retinopathy.
View and edit your patient records, send reports of diagnosis via email or contact the patient for another analysis.
Access, view and edit your account credentials such as email clinic/hospital name and location and your display name.
If you need solutions about patient\'s diagnosis, you can ask your health care assistant.
Edit your account credentials, just fill up again the account form for you to save and update you account.

All of your data (Patient information\'s are driven, uploaded into Firebase Realtime Database, this let\'s you access patient information\'s in real time by accessing Firebase Realtime Database. The good news is that, there\'s no limitation upon saving your patient\'s information.
Click one of the deleted patient\'s information for you to recover it.
Analyze patient\'s retina through capturing the patient\'s retina.
Analyze patient\'s retina through importing the patient\'s retinal image.
CHOOSE FROM THESE TWO METHODS OF CLASSIFICATION, EITHER IMPORT AN FUNDUS IMAGE OR CAPTURE PATIENTS RETINA
